recommendations: Engage in at least 30 minutes of moderate exercise daily.
Incorporate strength training exercises into your routine at least twice a week.
Find activities you enjoy to make exercising more enjoyable and sustainable.
Eat a variety of fruits and vegetables daily.
Limit processed foods and focus on whole, unprocessed foods.
Stay hydrated by drinking plenty of water throughout the day.
Aim for 7-9 hours of quality sleep per night for adults.
Create a relaxing bedtime routine to improve sleep quality.
Avoid screens (phones, tablets, computers) before bedtime to promote better sleep.
